input_email_body:
Subject: Trouble with Project Task Syncing Due to Third-Party Integration Issues

I am encountering difficulties with project tasks not syncing because of integration problems with third-party tools My name is Sophia Rossi.. Despite restarting the application and reviewing the settings, the issue continues You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. I would greatly appreciate any assistance in addressing this problem. Could you please guide me on the next steps to take?
